body: Donald Trump is surging in the polls, and Jimmy Fallon went through pros and cons of going to one of his campaign rallies. Pro: Hearing his plan on how to prevent our biggest threat from invading the U.S. Con: Realizing he's talking about Minions. [17 of Donald Trump's most Donald Trump pop culture moments] Pro: He blames Mexicans for the loss of U.S. jobs. Con: Specifically, his jobs at Macy's, Miss USA, and "Celebrity Apprentice." Pro: He wants to deport immigrants for entering the country illegally. Con: He wants to deport Ariana Grande for licking a donut. Unmentioned on Tuesday was the pro that you'd be going to one of the most entertaining political events of 2016 and the con you'd have to fight for parking with the thousands Trump claims make it out to his rallies.
